page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT (CHRISTMAS)
page.content: EVERY YAER AT CHRISTMAS TIME WE PUT ON A SCHOOL CONCERT. IT IS LOTS OF FUN BUT IT IS HARD WORK. OUR MUMS MAKE THE COSTUMES AND HELP WITH THE SCENERY. THE OLDER CHILDREN GENERALLY DO A MUSICAL PLAY OR A PANTOMIME, WHILE THE YOUNGER ONES SING SONGS AND ACT OUT NURSERY RHYMES. WE HAVE A CHOIR TOO. THE CONCERT THIS YEAR WAS HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL AND PERFORMED IN THE EVENING. IT IS ONE OF THE FEW TIMES EVERYONE IN THE VILLAGE CAN GET TOGETHER AND HAVE A GOOD TIME. AFTER WE HAVE PERFORMED, THERE ARE BRING AND BUY STALLS. OUR MUMS AND FRIENDS HELP US TO MAKE THINGS THAT ARE SUITABLE AS CHRISTMAS GIFTS AND DECORATIONS AS WELL AS HOME-MADE CANDY AND CAKES. WE ALSO SELL OLD BOOKS AND JUMBLE. THERE IS ALWAYS A RAFFLE. THERE ARE LOVELY PRIZES. OTHER WAYS OF MAKING MONEY ARE GUESSING THE WEIGHT OF THE CAKE.
